Text: This is the best sounding version so far, the sound quality in the other ones is awful.  No offense to the other uploaders.
why is it only 1.62 gigs shouldnt 42 hours be alot more then that?? i saw another one on this site with 4 gigs isnt that closer to what gigs we need?
No, 1.62 is plenty. Audiobooks sound just fine as low as 64 kpbs. The other guy uploaded 128 kpbs files which is a huge waste for audiobooks.
In fact I have both and I think this sounds better
Will try this, thanks in advance.
Just to verify, is this the unabridged version?
Wheel of Time audiobooks are always in unabridged format
